016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.jsonapi.resources;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.context.DomainContext;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.entity.Command;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.model.EntityModel;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.model.Model;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.*;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.server.resources.IncludesMixin;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.server.resources.RelationshipsMixin;
025import jakarta.ws.rs.core.UriBuilder;
026
027import java.net.URI;
028import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
029import java.util.function.Function;
030import java.util.function.Predicate;
031
032import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.JsonApiRels.related;
033import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.JsonApiRels.self;
034
035public interface ResourceObjectMapperMixin
036    extends IncludesMixin, RelationshipsMixin
037{
038    default <T extends Model> ResourceObjectMapperBuilder<T> resourceObjectMapper(Function<T, ResourceObject.Builder> mapper, Included.Builder included)
039    {
040        return new ResourceObjectMapperBuilder<>(mapper, included);
041    }
042
043    // Attributes
044    default <T extends Model> BiConsumer<T, ResourceObjectMapper> modelAttributes(Predicate<String> fieldSelection)
045    {
046        return (model, mapper) -> model.object().fields().forEachRemaining(entry ->
047        {
048            if (fieldSelection.test(entry.getKey()))
049                mapper.attributes().attribute(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
050        });
051    }
052
053    // Relationships
054    default <T extends Model> BiConsumer<T, ResourceObjectMapper> modelRelationship(Enum<?> relationshipName,
055                                                                                    Predicate<String> fieldSelection,
056                                                                                    String includePrefix,
057                                                                                    Function<T, URI> relationshipRelatedMapper,
058                                                                                    IncludedResourceObjects<T> includedResourceObjects)
059    {
060        String modelRelationshipPath = includePrefix+relationshipName;
061        if (shouldInclude(modelRelationshipPath))
062        {
063            return (model, mapper) ->
064            {
065                ResourceObjects resources = includedResourceObjects.resourceObjects(model, mapper, includePrefix);
066
067                Links.Builder links = new Links.Builder();
068                links.link(related, relationshipRelatedMapper.apply(model));
069
070                Relationship relationship = new Relationship.Builder()
071                        .resourceIdentifiers(resources)
072                        .links(links.build())
073                        .build();
074
075                mapper.relationships().relationship(relationshipName, relationship);
076                mapper.included().include(resources);
077            };
078        } else if (fieldSelection.test(relationshipName.name()))
079        {
080            return (model, mapper) ->
081            {
082                Links.Builder links = new Links.Builder();
083                links.link(related, relationshipRelatedMapper.apply(model));
084
085                Relationship relationship = new Relationship.Builder()
086                        .links(links.build())
087                        .build();
088
089                mapper.relationships().relationship(relationshipName, relationship);
090            };
091        } else
092        {
093            return (model, mapper) -> {};
094        }
095    }
096
097    interface IncludedResourceObjects<T extends Model>
098    {
099        ResourceObjects resourceObjects(T model, ResourceObjectMapper mapper, String relationshipIncludePrefix);
100    }
101
102    // Links
103    default <T extends Model> BiConsumer<T, ResourceObjectMapper> selfLink(Function<T, URI> linkMapper)
104    {
105        return (model, mapper) -> mapper.links().link(self, linkMapper.apply(model));
106    }
107
108    default <T extends EntityModel> BiConsumer<T, ResourceObjectMapper> selfLink(Class<?> resourceClass)
109    {
110        UriBuilder uriBuilder = getUriBuilderFor(resourceClass);
111        return selfLink(model -> uriBuilder.build(model.getId()));
112    }
113
114    default <T extends Model> BiConsumer<T, ResourceObjectMapper> commandLinks(Function<T, UriBuilder> baseUriMapper, Function<T, DomainContext> contextMapper) {
115        return (model, mapper) ->
116        {
117            DomainContext context = contextMapper.apply(model);
118            UriBuilder uriBuilder = baseUriMapper.apply(model);
119            Links.Builder links = mapper.links();
120            for (Command command : context.commands()) {
121                if (!Command.isDelete(command.getClass())) {
122                    String commandName = Command.getName(command);
123                    links.link(commandName, uriBuilder.replaceQueryParam("rel", commandName).toTemplate());
124                }
125            }
126        };
127    }
128
129    default <T extends EntityModel> BiConsumer<T, ResourceObjectMapper> commandLinks(Class<?> resourceClass, Function<T, DomainContext> contextMapper) {
130        UriBuilder uriBuilder = getUriBuilderFor(resourceClass);
131        return commandLinks(model -> uriBuilder.clone().resolveTemplate("id", model.getId()), contextMapper);
132    }
133
134    // Builders and helpers
135    class ResourceObjectMapperBuilder<T extends Model>
136    {
137        Function<T, ResourceObject.Builder> resourceObjectBuilderMapper;
138        private Included.Builder included;
139        BiConsumer<T, ResourceObjectMapper> consumers;
140
141        public ResourceObjectMapperBuilder(Function<T, ResourceObject.Builder> mapper, Included.Builder included) {
142            this.resourceObjectBuilderMapper = mapper;
143            this.included = included;
144        }
145
146        @SafeVarargs
147        public final ResourceObjectMapperBuilder<T> with(BiConsumer<T, ResourceObjectMapper>... consumers)
148        {
149            for (BiConsumer<T, ResourceObjectMapper> consumer : consumers) {
150                if (this.consumers == null)
151                {
152                    this.consumers = consumer;
153                } else
154                {
155                    this.consumers = this.consumers.andThen(consumer);
156                }
157            }
158            return this;
159        }
160
161        public Function<T, ResourceObject> build()
162        {
163            return model ->
164            {
165                ResourceObjectMapper resourceObjectMapper = new ResourceObjectMapper(resourceObjectBuilderMapper.apply(model), included);
166                consumers.accept(model, resourceObjectMapper);
167                return resourceObjectMapper.build();
168            };
169        }
170    }
171
172    record ResourceObjectMapper(ResourceObject.Builder resource, Attributes.Builder attributes, Links.Builder links, Relationships.Builder relationships,
173                                Meta.Builder meta, Included.Builder included)
174    {
175        public ResourceObjectMapper(ResourceObject.Builder resource, Included.Builder included) {
176            this(resource, new Attributes.Builder(), new Links.Builder(), new Relationships.Builder(), new Meta.Builder(), included);
177        }
178
179        public ResourceObject build()
180        {
181            if (!attributes.builder().isEmpty())
182            {
183                resource.attributes(attributes.build());
184            }
185
186            if (!links.builder().isEmpty())
187            {
188                resource.links(links.build());
189            }
190
191            if (!relationships.builder().isEmpty())
192            {
193                resource.relationships(relationships.build());
194            }
195
196            if (!meta.builder().isEmpty())
197            {
198                resource.meta(meta.build());
199            }
200
201            return resource.build();
202        }
203    }
204
205}
